column2: an A.M. Eatery////Service was a little on the slower side
column3: meaning we had to ask for our first glass of water twice as our waiter was super busy. I was a little confused when we first came in
column4: there is a counter that says please enjoy coffee while you wait
column5: but only water was present. There were a lot of other servers/helpers around that were also very helpful to us.
